entry.def: People use pageantry to refer to the colourful and formal things that are done for special official or royal occasions, for example the wearing of special clothes and the playing of special music.

example.ex: ...all the pageantry of an official state visit.

means.word_mean: 2. an elaborate representation of scenes from history etc; usually involves a parade with rich costumes
